import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import { addOrder } from '../apiCallsForDB/api' import Orders from './Orders' const initialState = { "id": "", "customer_name": " ", "customer_email": "", "product": "", "quantity": '' } const AddNewOrder = () => { const ref = useRef(null) const refClose = useRef(null) const [order, setorder] = useState(initialState); const {customer_name ,customer_email , product,quantity} = order; const onChange = (e) => { eventp setorder({ ...order, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) console.log(order); } const AddingOrderInDB =async ()=>{ await addOrder(order) refClose.current.click(); } return ( <>

) } export default AddNewOrder
